headline: AppLovin Stock (APP) Selloff Offers High-Risk, High-Reward Options Trade
summary: Disappointment remains an overriding theme for mobile technology specialist AppLovin (APP). Since early June, APP stock has declined by more than 22%, with Friday’s price action being particularly severe. Fundamentally, investors have been rushing for the exits when it became clear that the underlying enterprise would not be joining the S&P 500. Inclusion in the S&P 500 is more than a badge of honor—it drives institutional buying as index funds rebalance. Many expected AppLovin (APP) to join the
